definition: to go forward/to advance/to go in/to enter/to put in/to submit/to take in/to admit/(math.) base of a number system/classifier for sections in a building or residential compound
system/to control/to regulate/variant of 製|制[zhi4]

sentences.english: The word hexadecimal is derived from the number 16 .
sentences.chinese: 十六进制一词是从十六这个数得来的。

sentences.english: Which brings you to the files with the hex digit gobbledygook names.
sentences.chinese: 配有十六进制数字冗长名称的文件带给您什么内容。

sentences.english: Hyphens are just used to separate the hexadecimal digits for the sake of clarity.
sentences.chinese: 连字号纯粹为了清晰的缘故而把十六进制数字分开。

sentences.english: Deletes and overwrites files with the hexadecimal value 0x00.
sentences.chinese: 删除文件并以十六进制0重写文件。

sentences.english: This allows hexadecimal values in regular expressions when parsing.
sentences.chinese: 这允许在解析时在正则表达式中使用十六进制值。

sentences.english: A valid custom delimiter must have an even number of hexadecimal digits.
sentences.chinese: 有效的自定义分隔符必须具有偶数个十六进制数字。

sentences.english: Encode the hashed byte array into hex characters.
sentences.chinese: 将哈希后的字节数组编码成十六进制字符。

sentences.english: The character which when preceded by an escape character represents the start of a hexadecimal character constant.
sentences.chinese: 前跟转义字符用于标识十六进制字符常量开始的字符。

sentences.english: Will decimal number for hexadecimal number 216 conversion is D8.
sentences.chinese: 将十进制数216转换为十六进制数是D8。

definition: complementary code/binary code with 0 and 1 interchanged
unsigned (i.e. the absolute value, regardless of plus or minus sign)
